name: Rainbow Snake
description:
Rainbow Snake Is A Beautiful Classic Game. Eating Food, Snake Painted In Different Colors. Collect a colorful snake and avoid the green walls. Over time, the snake is gaining speed!

Simple Game Mechanics
You can die when you hit the wall and you can't eat yourself

The snake is gaining speed, be more careful
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
